channel.title: Okta Terraform Provider :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta Terraform Provider Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: - Changes: update title Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Automate org management with Terraform: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/terraform-landing-page/main/ Why is this here?: Based on Oktane GroupIt data, most external customers placed Terraform under Automate Structure type: Navigation Content type: Guide Hub A guide hub is the main navigation page for a section, such as learn, plan, or build.

item.title: Terraform basics
item.description: Terraform basics Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Terraform overview: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/terraform-overview/main/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.

item.title: Enable Terraform access
item.description: Enable Terraform access for your Okta org Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Enable Terraform access for your Okta org: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/terraform-enable-org-access/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. They tend to walk the reader through administrative tasks but not exclusively.

item.title: Manage user access
item.description: Manage user access Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: - The current preference is to keep manage user access using Terraform under Terraform rather than under “Manage users”. The thought was at least for now keep the Terraform docs together and split up different ways to manage user access. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title

item.title: Manage groups
item.description: Manage groups Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: - See Manage user access Motiviations Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Manage groups with Terraform: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/terraform-manage-groups/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.

item.title: Manage authentication services
item.description: Manage authentication services Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This could go under level2 customize than we would split up Terraform based on functionality of what customers are trying to to do. Need more discussion regard this. Test at Oktane test. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Manage authentication services with Terraform: https://developer.
